articles.description: The 48-year-old Scot says doctors have told him he has between two and four years to live.
articles.title: Cyclist Chris Hoy announces that his cancer is terminal

articles.description: McLaren’s Lando Norris beats title rival Max Verstappen’s Red Bull to pole position at the United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: US Grand Prix: Lando Norris beats Max Verstappen to pole in Austin

articles.description: Just eight games into the Premier League season and Arsenal have already had three players sent off - but just how costly could it be?
articles.title: Arsenal's red card problem: Will discipline problem cost Gunners the title?

articles.description: Manchester United manager Erik ten Hag believes the comeback victory against Brentford is proof of the "togetherness" in his squad.
articles.title: Man Utd 2-1 Brentford: Erik ten Hag praises Red Devils' 'togetherness'

articles.description: Rafael Nadal reflects on an "amazing rivalry" with Novak Djokovic after losing their final meeting as professionals.
articles.title: Rafael Nadal loses to Novak Djokovic and reflects on 'amazing rivalry'

articles.description: New Zealand retain the America's Cup after beating Great Britain 7-2 in the 37th edition of the event.
articles.title: New Zealand beat Great Britain to win America's Cup

articles.title: Celta de Vigo vs Real Madrid: Primera División - BBC Sport

articles.title: Ngannou vs Ferreira: Ngannou stops heavyweight in first round of MMA return at PFL Super Fights

articles.description: Can Southampton manager Russell Martin's passing principles survive a dramatic collapse at home to Leicester City?
articles.title: Southampton boss Russell Martin faces test of principles

articles.description: Lightweight contender Adam Azim passes his toughest test to date with an impressive eighth-round stoppage win over Ohara Davies at London's Copper Box Arena.
articles.title: Adam Azim stops Ohara Davies in eighth round in London
